channel.title: GTF on Badran Elshenawy
channel.description: Recent content in GTF on Badran Elshenawy

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 10: Capstone & Final Recap
item.description: Master the RNA-Seq pipeline with this capstone recap. Includes practical examples, file structure tips, and command-line snippets to help you implement each step efficiently.

item.title: Bulk RNA-Seq Series – Post 9: Understanding GTF & GFF Files for Feature Annotation
item.description: Understand how GTF and GFF files guide RNA-Seq read interpretation and enable accurate feature quantification. Discover practical use cases, including ERV annotation.
